title: Trump pitches 'Trumpcare' on Fox News
shortDescription: President Donald Trump proposed a new health care plan on Fox News' "The Ingraham Angle", promising lower premiums and more control for consumers.

title: When will the House vote on the shutdown deal? What happens next.
shortDescription: The federal government appears on track to reopen soon. Here's a look at what happens next.

title: Senates approves shutdown deal; House to vote next. Live updates
shortDescription: The Senate approved a deal to end the nation's longest-ever government shutdown, putting Congress on the brink of resolving a weeks-long fight.

title: Furious Democrats rip shutdown deal as missing the moment
shortDescription: The federal shutdown is on the verge of being resolved after more than 40 days, but for many Democrats, it wasn't a road to victory.

title: Senate passes bipartisan deal to end government shutdown
shortDescription: Senators voted on an agreement that will keep the government open until Jan. 30. The continuing resolution now heads to the House of Representatives.

title: Trump’s $2K check plan likely costs $600B
shortDescription: President Donald Trump’s $2,000 tariff rebate plan could cost $600B yearly, double the revenue tariffs generate.

title: Video: Argentine President Milei does the 'Trump Dance'
shortDescription: Pumping his fists into the air to the beat of the music, Argentina's president shows off his host's dance moves at Mar-a-Lago.

title: Trump's $2,000 rebate checks would cost $600 billion, study says
shortDescription: The nonpartisan nonprofit Committee for a Responsible Federal Budget released cost projections after President Trump pitched his idea this weekend.

title: Trump pushes back on Marjorie Taylor Greene: 'She's lost her way.'
shortDescription: President Trump said Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene, long one of his strongest MAGA allies, has "lost her way" amid her recent criticism of the GOP.

title: Trump says MTG 'lost her way'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said Marjorie Taylor Greene has “lost her way” after she questions his foreign policy priorities.

title: Trump to pardon this 'huge group of Americans'
shortDescription: Justice Department lawyer Ed Martin said he’s leading an extensive effort to identify those Trump believes were wronged by Presidents Obama or Biden.

title: Is Trump sending $2,000 dividends for tariff revenue? What to know
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he is considering a $2,000 payment back to Americans for the tariff revenue. But such an idea would need Congress.

title: Christine Pelosi running for CA state Senate seat, not Congress
shortDescription: Christine Pelosi said she will run for a California state Senate seat representing San Francisco, thanks in part to her mom's 2026 exit.

title: Trump demands air traffic controllers return
shortDescription: President Donald Trump demands air traffic controllers return to work and proposes $10K bonuses for loyal staff.

title: See Trump’s use of presidential pardons in his second term
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's second term has included numerous pardons including for some notable people and high-profile cases.

title: Trump's shutdown moves dialed up the pain. Did the strategy work?
shortDescription: Laid off federal workers. Lapsed food aid. Airline flight cuts. The pain was mounting before Democrats agreed to a deal ending the shutdown.

title: How many people has Trump pardoned in 2025? See list before Giuliani.
shortDescription: President Donald Trump pardoned a slate of people who allegedly interferred in the 2020 election. It includes Rudy Giuliani, who else? What we know.
